blank_string(value, field)
The blank_string function checks if the value is blank and returns a string

of ‘None’ or the original value.

Parameters

  • value – Used to Pass the value of the field to be blanked.

  • field – Used to Specify the field in the record that should be returned.

Returns

The value of the field.

blank_array(value, field)
